name: Decorative Book Set 01
info:
These books are intended to be used as environment props in a medium to close range.

There are 87 unique and original cover designs, all [created by our community](https://blog.polyhaven.com/book-magazine-cover-design-contest/). The covers are also licensed as [CC0](https://polyhaven.com/license).

Author credits for each design can be seen by hovering over the thumbnails to the left.

The customizable shader allows you to adjust the damage and age of each book independently. For this reason a GLTF version is not currently available.
